About the Authors

Fischer Parson

A dad to four beautiful children and a husband to a wonderful wife. They reside in North Carolina where Fischer is working on the site (Theology of a Bad Christian) to share The Word of God, and the theology behind it. Growing up in Church, studying theology, and the Bible in school, along with the insperation and help from God, he hopes to encourage others to dive deeper into the word and what it means.
